ns:item.text: NT Mutation Summary, By Position and Base
AA Mutation Summary, By Position and Codon

ns:column.ns:description: This column describes the construction of this library, such as whole genome sequencing, targeted capture, amplicon, etc.
The column shows the number of alignments that contain a first-mate or singleton read
The column shows the number of alignments that contain a second-mate read
The column shows the number of alignments that contain both forward and reverse reads
Optional. Can be used in conjunction with stop to select a subsequence of the reference. If blank the region will begin at the first base of the reference
Optional. Can be used in conjunction with start to select a subsequence of the reference. If blank the region will end with the final base of the reference
